leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 实验室自动化-机器人与设备集成生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 驱动→编排→记录→监控→审计
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 设备接口 + 调度 + 监控

unit.unit_name: 设备驱动/通信协议/接口层

queries: [WEB] open source liquid handler driver github

tools.name: nmea
tools.one_line_profile: Rust parser for NMEA 0183 marine electronics protocol
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library for parsing NMEA 0183 messages, widely used in marine robotics and scientific data acquisition from GNSS receivers, sonars, and anemometers.

tools.name: pyLabLib
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for device control and experiment automation
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for controlling various laboratory devices (cameras, stages, sensors) and automating scientific experiments.

tools.name: scpi-rs
tools.one_line_profile: SCPI command parser for Rust
tools.detailed_description: A Rust implementation of the Standard Commands for Programmable Instruments (SCPI) parser, enabling the development of instrument firmware or control software.

tools.name: Instruments.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Instrument control library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for interfacing with scientific instruments, providing a unified framework for device communication and experiment control.

tools.name: PyQLab
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for superconducting QIP experiment control
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for controlling instruments and running experiments in superconducting quantum information processing (QIP) labs.

tools.name: LabToolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Python module for instrument control and automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for communicating with and controlling various laboratory instruments via standard protocols like VISA.

tools.name: GazeAtDS1054
tools.one_line_profile: Viewer and control tool for Rigol DS1054Z oscilloscopes
tools.detailed_description: A software tool for viewing waveforms and controlling Rigol DS1054Z oscilloscopes via USB or TCP using PyVISA.

tools.name: ImSwitch
tools.one_line_profile: General-purpose microscope control software
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based software solution for controlling complex microscope setups, supporting multiple modalities and flexible hardware integration.

tools.name: Labber Drivers
tools.one_line_profile: Instrument drivers for Labber software
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python-based instrument drivers for the Labber measurement and automation software platform.

tools.name: oic
tools.one_line_profile: Open Instrument Control library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for controlling scientific instruments, aiming to provide a standardized interface for laboratory automation.

tools.name: leicacam
tools.one_line_profile: Python control for Leica microscopes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for controlling Leica microscopes and cameras, facilitating automated imaging workflows.

tools.name: bqev23k
tools.one_line_profile: Control software for TI EV2300 and BQ40Z80 battery managers
tools.detailed_description: A C# WPF application for controlling Texas Instruments EV2300 hardware interfaces, specifically for battery impedance tracking and management research.

tools.name: scpi_parser
tools.one_line_profile: SCPI parser implementation in C
tools.detailed_description: A C library implementing the SCPI (Standard Commands for Programmable Instruments) protocol, designed for embedded devices and instrument firmware.

tools.name: lab-control-GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable GUI for centralized laboratory device control
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface designed to centralize control of various laboratory devices, operating on a shared API for instrument drivers.

tools.name: JISA
tools.one_line_profile: Java library for instrument control and experiment automation
tools.detailed_description: A Java library providing standardized instrument control, data handling, and GUI creation tools for scientific experiments.

tools.name: place
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for laboratory automation and experimentation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for laboratory automation, control, and experimentation, facilitating the integration of various instruments.

tools.name: PyLabRobot
tools.one_line_profile: Hardware agnostic SDK for lab automation
tools.detailed_description: An open-source, hardware-agnostic Python SDK for laboratory automation, focusing on liquid handling robots and providing a unified interface.

tools.name: RsInstrument
tools.one_line_profile: Rohde & Schwarz instrument control library for Python
tools.detailed_description: The official Python remote-control communication module for Rohde & Schwarz SCPI-based Test and Measurement Instruments.

tools.name: Rohde & Schwarz Python Instrument Control Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for controlling Rohde & Schwarz electronic test and measurement instruments
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing a collection of tools and drivers to interface with and control Rohde & Schwarz instruments, facilitating automated testing and measurement workflows.

tools.name: navigate
tools.one_line_profile: Open source control software for light-sheet microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based control software suite designed for light-sheet microscopes, enabling hardware integration and automated imaging sequences.

tools.name: BrightEyes-MCS
tools.one_line_profile: Microscope Control Suite for advanced imaging experiments
tools.detailed_description: A software suite developed by VicidominiLab for controlling microscopes, specifically designed to support advanced imaging techniques and hardware synchronization.

tools.name: Vrekrer SCPI Parser
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient SCPI command parser for Arduino and embedded systems
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight C library for parsing Standard Commands for Programmable Instruments (SCPI) on Arduino and other microcontrollers, enabling the creation of custom scientific instruments.

tools.name: storm-control
tools.one_line_profile: Control software for STORM super-resolution microscopy
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive software package for controlling hardware components in Stochastic Optical Reconstruction Microscopy (STORM) setups, including cameras, stages, and lasers.

tools.name: Cicero Word Generator
tools.one_line_profile: Control software suite for atomic physics experiments
tools.detailed_description: A user interface and control software suite designed for designing and running sequences on National Instruments digital and analog output cards, specifically tailored for atomic physics experiments.

tools.name: webusbtmc
tools.one_line_profile: Browser-based control for USB Test and Measurement Class devices
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library enabling direct control of USBTMC (USB Test and Measurement Class) instruments from a web browser using the WebUSB API.

tools.name: keyoscacquire
tools.one_line_profile: Trace acquisition from Keysight InfiniiVision oscilloscopes
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for acquiring and saving traces from Keysight InfiniiVision oscilloscopes via a VISA interface, simplifying data collection workflows.

tools.name: tektronix-func-gen
tools.one_line_profile: Control library for Tektronix arbitrary function generators
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for controlling Tektronix AFG1000 and AFG3000 series arbitrary function generators through PyVISA.

tools.name: Coupling_ABAQUS_MATLAB
tools.one_line_profile: Software-in-the-Loop framework coupling ABAQUS and MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: A framework for running finite element packages (ABAQUS) inside an online loop with MATLAB for structural optimization and control theory simulations.

tools.name: autolab
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for scientific experiment automation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the control of laboratory instruments and the automation of scientific experiments, providing a unified interface for various devices.

tools.name: flowchem
tools.one_line_profile: Control software for automated chemistry lab instruments
tools.detailed_description: An application to simplify the control and automation of instruments and devices commonly found in chemistry laboratories, facilitating flow chemistry workflows.

tools.name: pyTEM
tools.one_line_profile: Control and automation library for Transmission Electron Microscopes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library developed by BASF for the control and automation of Transmission Electron Microscopes (TEM), enabling scripted microscopy workflows.

tools.name: easy-scpi
tools.one_line_profile: High-level library for controlling SCPI instruments
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to simplify the control of instruments that communicate via the SCPI protocol, providing an easy-to-use interface for sending commands and querying data.

tools.name: eakins-camera
tools.one_line_profile: Socket-based control for Eakins microscope cameras
tools.detailed_description: A tool for controlling Eakins microscope cameras via network sockets, allowing for remote operation and integration into microscopy setups.

tools.name: Pycrafter6500
tools.one_line_profile: Controller for TI DLPLCR6500EVM DLP evaluation module
tools.detailed_description: A Python controller for the Texas Instruments DLPLCR6500EVM DLP technology evaluation module, enabling 'pattern on the fly' mode control for scientific imaging and lithography applications.

tools.name: coPylot
tools.one_line_profile: Microscope control software from CZ Biohub
tools.detailed_description: Microscope control software developed by the Chan Zuckerberg Biohub, designed to facilitate automated imaging workflows.

tools.name: Ship-Detection-from-Satellite-Images-using-YOLOV4
tools.one_line_profile: Ship detection workflow for satellite imagery using YOLOv4
tools.detailed_description: A scientific workflow and implementation for detecting ships in remote sensing (SAR) imagery using the YOLOv4 deep learning algorithm, applicable to maritime security and monitoring.

tools.name: pyhamilton
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for Hamilton liquid handling robots
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python package for controlling Hamilton liquid handling robots, enabling complex automation protocols and integration with other Python scientific libraries.

tools.name: OpenLH
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source liquid handling system based on robotic arms
tools.detailed_description: A liquid handling system built on the uARM swift Pro robotic arm platform, designed to allow for creative exploration and automation in biology labs.

tools.name: InstrumentKit
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for communicating with laboratory equipment
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate communication with various laboratory instruments (multimeters, power supplies, etc.) over different buses (GPIB, USB, Serial).

tools.name: scpi-parser
tools.one_line_profile: Open Source SCPI device library for embedded systems
tools.detailed_description: A robust C library for parsing SCPI commands on embedded devices, enabling the development of SCPI-compliant scientific instruments.

tools.name: YouScope
tools.one_line_profile: Open-source microscope control software
tools.detailed_description: YouScope is a microscope control software designed to automate imaging tasks. It provides a framework for controlling various microscope hardware components.

tools.name: PMSM-28335
tools.one_line_profile: Sensorless field orientation control for PMSM motors on DSP
tools.detailed_description: Real-time implementation of sensorless field orientation control (FOC) for a three-phase Permanent-Magnetic Synchronous Motor (PMSM) using the Texas Instruments F28335 DSP. Useful for robotics and precision motion control in lab settings.

tools.name: pyTecanFluent
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface for TECAN Fluent liquid handling robots
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing an interface to control TECAN Fluent liquid handling robots, facilitating automation of liquid handling tasks in biological laboratories.

tools.name: lightlab
tools.one_line_profile: Laboratory instrumentation and automation framework for photonics
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for laboratory instrumentation and automation, specifically tailored for photonics and lightwave experiments. It abstracts hardware control and measurement procedures.

tools.name: camera-controller
tools.one_line_profile: Microscope camera control interface
tools.detailed_description: A user interface and control software for digital cameras attached to microscopes, developed by the Manoharan Lab. It facilitates image acquisition in microscopy experiments.

tools.name: labdrivers
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of Python drivers for common lab hardware
tools.detailed_description: A library of Python drivers for various laboratory hardware instruments, enabling researchers to integrate different devices into their automation scripts.

tools.name: Test_Equipment_Control
tools.one_line_profile: Control scripts for battery and converter testing equipment
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools for controlling various lab test equipment, specifically focused on battery testing and DC-DC converter testing scenarios.

tools.name: mesoSPIM-control
tools.one_line_profile: Acquisition software for mesoSPIM light-sheet microscopes
tools.detailed_description: Software for controlling mesoSPIM (mesoscale Selective Plane Illumination Microscopy) setups, handling image acquisition and hardware synchronization.

tools.name: ExEngine
tools.one_line_profile: Execution engine for Micro-Manager microscope control
tools.detailed_description: The execution engine component for Micro-Manager, facilitating the sequencing and coordination of microscope hardware operations.

tools.name: Micro-Manager
tools.one_line_profile: Open source software for microscope image acquisition and control
tools.detailed_description: The industry-standard open-source software for controlling automated microscopes and imaging devices. It integrates with ImageJ for image processing and analysis.

tools.name: pyvisa-mock
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation backend for PyVISA
tools.detailed_description: A testing framework and simulation backend for PyVISA, allowing developers to test instrument control software without physical hardware by mocking VISA devices.

tools.name: dinolite_uvc_led_control
tools.one_line_profile: Control module for Dino Lite USB microscope LEDs
tools.detailed_description: A Python module to control LEDs, auto-exposure, and other UVC (USB Video Class) features for Dino Lite USB microscopes.

tools.name: NICOS
tools.one_line_profile: Networked Instrument Control System
tools.detailed_description: A control system software used for controlling neutron scattering instruments and other large-scale scientific experiments, originally developed at FRM II.

tools.name: MicroFPGA
tools.one_line_profile: FPGA-based platform for microscope electronic control
tools.detailed_description: An FPGA-based platform for controlling microscope elements such as lasers, servos, and cameras. It provides high-speed signal generation and acquisition.

tools.name: MicroFPGA-py
tools.one_line_profile: Python communication package for MicroFPGA
tools.detailed_description: The Python client library for communicating with the MicroFPGA hardware platform, enabling software-defined control of microscope electronics.

tools.name: uScopeControl
tools.one_line_profile: Microscope control software hub
tools.detailed_description: A software hub designed for controlling microscopes, aiming to provide a next-generation interface for microscopy automation.

tools.name: jds6600_python
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for JDS6600 signal generators
tools.detailed_description: A Python library to remotely control Junce-Instruments JDS6600 signal generators via USB, enabling automated signal generation.

tools.name: UC2-Hi2
tools.one_line_profile: Automated imaging controller for UC2 microscopes
tools.detailed_description: Control software and scripts for the UC2 (You See Too) modular microscope system, specifically for automated multiwell plate imaging using GRBL-based stages.

tools.name: slave
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight Python package for instrument control
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to simplify the process of controlling laboratory instruments, providing a lightweight abstraction layer.

tools.name: python-usbtmc
tools.one_line_profile: USBTMC driver for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python driver for controlling instruments over USB using the USBTMC (USB Test and Measurement Class) protocol, independent of VISA.

tools.name: python-vxi11
tools.one_line_profile: VXI-11 driver for Python
tools.detailed_description: A Python driver for controlling instruments over Ethernet using the VXI-11 protocol, enabling network-based instrument automation.

tools.name: python-microscope
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for high-performance microscope control
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for controlling microscope devices, designed to support hardware triggers and distributed device control over networks for high-performance imaging.

tools.name: PyVISA
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for VISA (Virtual Instrument Software Architecture)
tools.detailed_description: The standard Python package for controlling measurement devices and test equipment via GPIB, RS232, USB, or Ethernet using the VISA standard.

tools.name: PyVISA-py
tools.one_line_profile: Pure Python backend for PyVISA
tools.detailed_description: A pure Python backend for PyVISA that implements VISA protocols directly, allowing instrument control without installing proprietary VISA libraries (like NI-VISA).

tools.name: PyVISA-sim
tools.one_line_profile: Simulation backend for PyVISA
tools.detailed_description: A backend for PyVISA that simulates VISA devices based on YAML configuration files, enabling offline development and testing of instrument control software.

tools.name: wavebin
tools.one_line_profile: Oscilloscope waveform capture and inspection tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool to capture, parse, and inspect multi-channel oscilloscope waveforms from binary files produced by Agilent/Keysight/Rigol oscilloscopes.

tools.name: msox3000
tools.one_line_profile: Control library for Keysight MSO-X/DSO-X 3000A oscilloscopes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for controlling HP/Agilent/Keysight MSO-X and DSO-X 3000A series oscilloscopes via PyVISA.

tools.name: oscope-scpi
tools.one_line_profile: SCPI control for Keysight oscilloscopes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for controlling various Keysight oscilloscopes (MSO-X/DSO-X 3000A, UXR, MXR) using SCPI commands via PyVISA.

tools.name: plmctrl
tools.one_line_profile: Control library for Texas Instruments DLP6750 Phase-only Light Modulators
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library designed to control the 0.67" (DLP6750 EVM) Texas-Instruments Phase-only Light Modulator (PLM) through its video interface, facilitating optical experiments and structured light research.

tools.name: curvequery
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for downloading waveform curves from Tektronix oscilloscopes
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to simplify the process of querying and downloading curve data from Tektronix oscilloscopes for scientific data acquisition and analysis.

tools.name: AFL-automation
tools.one_line_profile: Automation software for the NIST Autonomous Formulation Lab
tools.detailed_description: A flexible, web-based backend and driver framework developed by NIST for integrating devices and managing workflows in the Autonomous Formulation Lab (AFL).

tools.name: AutoScriptCopilot
tools.one_line_profile: Automated control workflows for Transmission Electron Microscopes (TEM)
tools.detailed_description: State machine-based workflows for automated Transmission Electron Microscope (TEM) experiment control, leveraging the nodeology framework and Thermo Fisher's AutoScript interface. Developed at Argonne National Laboratory.

tools.name: Instrumentino
tools.one_line_profile: GUI framework for controlling Arduino-based experimental instruments
tools.detailed_description: An open-source modular graphical user interface framework designed to control Arduino-based experimental instruments, facilitating custom lab setup and data acquisition.
